title: Online Community Portals Offer Cheaper Airfares
text: Online Community Portals Offer Cheaper Airfares Online community portals are helpful for people of same community residing abroad but now these portals are also offering cheaper airfares if the members wish to go home. USA, 16 September 2015 -- The city of Atlanta offers home and food for many who are not the basic natives of the city. The city has accepted these communities becomingly and even extend every possible help for the development of these outsiders. There are online portals created specifically aiming at the needs and information about a particular community in Atlanta. These now even offer cheaper airfares.The city of Atlanta offers home and food for many who are not the basic natives of the city. The city has accepted these communities becomingly and even extend every possible help for the development of these outsiders. There are online portals created specifically aiming at the needs and information about a particular community in Atlanta. These now even offer cheaper airfares. These online community portals offer lot of information about basic living, jobs, foods and restaurant specifically for the community members like an Indian community portal in Atlanta helps all the Indians registered as members with the access to information to various jobs opening, Indian restaurants and upcoming events and much more. These online portals have now started providing air tickets at a lower price than available directly if you are going to visit your native place from Atlanta. This has come up like a gift from the portals to their members. The airfare to India offered by one of the Indian community portal is quite less if the members wish to visit their country India. We asked one of the makers of an Indian community portal GAdesi.com about the new scheme they have launched, he mentioned,” We have introduced cheaper air fare for our members if they wish to visit India. Other than this, our site helps Indians to connect with their community here in Atlanta and we have extended that help to connect an Indian to his native place at a lower price.” He further extended his thanks,” We are thankful to the Atlanta air service for alliance with us and helping us.” We asked one of the Indians about the offer introduced, he mentioned,” I am going India a little early and for a longer period this time after availing the cheap fare offer from GAdesi.com.” # # #
